S04n400:2: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–ākhyāhi bhagavan avalokiteśvarasya bhūtapurvaṃ kṛtamete samādhayaḥ,
S04n400:7: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī āha–nirdeśaya bhagavaṃstāni samādhīni sarvasattvānukampayā |
S04n400:8: bhagavānāha–tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ākārakaro nāma samādhiḥ,
S04n400:70: ebhiṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samādhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ |
S04n400:75: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra ahaṃ siṃhalarājo nāma bodhisattvabhūto'bhūvam |
S04n400:77: pañcabhirvaṇikputraśataiḥ sārdhaṃ śakaṭairbhārairmūṭaiḥ piṭharairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhādibhiḥ prabhūtaṃ paṇyamāropya siṃhaladvīpaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ |
S04n400:80: tadā me karṇadhārā āhuḥ–kathaya kathaya yuṣmākaṃ katamadvīpeṣu gamanāyedṛśā vāyavo vānti ?
S04n400:83: atha karṇadhāra evamāha– yatkhalu devo jānīyāt–siṃhaladvīpeṣu vāyavo vānti |
S04n400:85: tato'haṃ siṃhaladvīpanivāsinībhī rākṣasībhiḥ saṃprasthito viditvā akālavāyava utsṛṣṭāḥ |
S04n400:87: te ca vaṇikpuruṣā udake patitā bāhubalena saṃtartumārabdhāḥ |
S04n400:89: tato rākṣasīnāṃ pañca śatāni niṣkrāntāni kilakilāyamānāni |
S04n400:92: te ca svakīyāni vastrāṇi śarīre lagnāni gṛhītvā niṣpīḍitumārabdhāḥ |
S04n400:93: niṣpīḍayitvā te tasmātsthānādatikramya anyapradeśe mahataścampakavṛkṣasya tale viśrāntāḥ |
S04n400:97: atha teṣāṃ rākṣasyaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ purataḥ sthitvaivamāhuḥ–svāgatam |
S04n400:104: imāni te'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi yānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi kaṭakakeyūrāṇāṃ maulikuṇḍalānāṃ gṛhāṇi udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkiriṇīramaṇīyāni saṃtiṣṭhanti |
S04n400:105: tābhī rākṣasībhirekaikaṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhītvā svakaṃ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ pratyudgatāḥ |
S04n400:107: tayāhaṃ svakīyaṃ niveśanaṃ nītvā divyarasasāgropetenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ |
S04n400:109: sa tu tato mānuṣyakena saukhyena saṃtarpitaḥ |
S04n400:113: na kadācitsyānmayā dṛṣṭaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā prajvalitameva ratikarahasanam,
S04n400:114: tadaiva mayā tasya pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ–kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ hasase ?
S04n400:117: tadā me tasya pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ–tvaṃ jānāsi rākṣasīti ?
S04n400:122: anye ca jīvanto anye ca mṛtāḥ |
S04n400:127: tadā tasyāstena mohajālā nāma nidrāti sā ||
S04n400:128: atha sa bodhisattvo rātriprathamayāme samaye tasyā rākṣasyāḥ sakāśādutthāya saṃprasthitaḥ |
S04n400:134: atha tasminnāyase nagare mahān yaścampakavṛkṣastatraivāruhya tato mayā teṣāmutkāsanaśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ |
S04n400:135: tato me vaṇikpuruṣāḥ kathayanti–yatkhalu mahāsārthavāho jānīyāt–vayaṃ rākṣasībhirāyase nagare prakṣiptāḥ |
S04n400:136: tadā dine dine śataṃ puruṣāṇāṃ gṛhītvā bhakṣayanti |
S04n400:139: tadāhaṃ campakavṛkṣādavatīrya punareva dakṣiṇāṃ panthalikāṃ gṛhītvā anuvicaran tvarita āgacchāmi sma |
S04n400:141: atha ratikaro māmetadavocat– dṛṣṭaste sārthavāha madvacanam?
S04n400:142: uktaṃ ca mayā–dṛṣṭaṃ yuṣmākaṃ satyaṃ sāṃkathyakṛtam |
S04n400:145: atha sa ratikara etadavocat–asti me mahāsārthavāhopāyam,
S04n400:148: atha sa ratikaro māmetadavocat–asti tasminneva dvīpe mahāsamudratīre devabālāho nāmāśvarājo hīnadīnānukampakaḥ |
S04n400:150: sarvaśvetānāmauṣadhīṃ bhuktvā suvarṇavālukāsthale āvartanaparivartanasaṃparivartanaṃ kṛtvā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayati,
S04n400:154: evaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā sā rākṣasī samīpamupagamya sārdhaṃ śayita eva prativibuddhā |
S04n400:157: tadā mayā tasyā mṛṣāvādaṃ pratyāhāraṃ kṛtam |
S04n400:161: tataḥ prātaḥ sūryasya cābhyudgamanakālasamaye utthāya teṣāṃ vaṇikpurūṣāṇāmārocayati sma–āgacchantu bhavanto bahirnagarasya gacchāmaḥ |
S04n400:162: te sarve sahitāḥ samagrā bahirnagarasya saṃprasthitāḥ |
S04n400:163: te ca bahirnagarasya gatvā ekānte viśrāntāḥ sāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ–kasya kīdṛśī bhāryā snehavatī?
S04n400:171: tadā teṣāṃ vaṇikpuruṣāṇāṃ pratyāhāraṃ karoti sma–na yuṣmākaṃ yuktamidaṃ yadvayaṃ rākṣasībhiḥ prasaktāḥ |
S04n400:172: iti śrutvā te vihvalībhūtāḥ evamāhuḥ–satyaṃ mahāsārthavāha,
S04n400:174: tadā teṣāṃ mayā pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ–satyaṃ satyaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghebhyaṃ,
S04n400:178: tadā teṣāṃ mayā pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ– asmākaṃ gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam ?
S04n400:180: atha sa teṣāmevamāha–asti yuṣmākaṃ siṃhaladvīpe bālāho nāma aśvarājaḥ |
S04n400:183: kṛtvā ca śarīraṃ pracchoḍayitvā vāṇīṃ pratyāharediti–kaḥ pāragāmī kaḥ pāragāmī kaḥ pāragāmīti |
S04n400:185: atha te vaṇikpurūṣā ūcuḥ–katame dine gacchāmo vayam?
S04n400:188: te kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā punareva tannagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ svakasvakaṃ niveśanamupagatā |
S04n400:191: sa kathayati–na ca te kiṃcid dṛṣṭam |
S04n400:192: atha sā rākṣasī tametadavocat–santi āryaputra vividhānyasmin siṃhaladvīpe udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni vividhavicitrapuṣpaparipūrṇāni |
S04n400:194: sa pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhaḥ–tṛtīye divase gamiṣyāmītyataḥ saṃbalaṃ kartavyam |
S04n400:196: tāni ca vividhāni puṣkariṇīśatāni ramaṇīyāni udyānaśatāni puṣpaparipūrṇāni paśyāmi |
S04n400:197: tāni ca vividhāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā āgamiṣyāmi |
S04n400:206: sā kathayati rākṣasī–āryaputra kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ucchvāsaṃ choritam ?
S04n400:209: asminneva siṃhaladvīpe vividhānyannagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi vividhānyudyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni |
S04n400:215: tṛtīye divase pratyūṣakālasamaye sarve te saṃprasthitāḥ |
S04n400:218: na punaḥ kenacit punareva siṃhaladvīpo nirīkṣitavyaḥ |
S04n400:220: īdṛśaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā saṃprasthitāḥ tvaritaṃ tvaritameva laghu laghveva gacchanti |
S04n400:226: yadā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayati tadā siṃhaladvīpaṃ calati sma |
S04n400:237: yadā te ārūḍhāḥ tadā siṃhaladvīpanivāsinyo rākṣasyaḥ kilakilāyamānāḥ pṛṣṭhato dhāvanti sma rudantyaḥ karuṇakaruṇairvilāpaiḥ |
S04n400:242: tadā rākṣasya utkṣipya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti sma |
S04n400:244: tadā tīrasya samīpe bālāhamaśvarājaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva prakrāntaḥ |
S04n400:247: tadā me mātāpitārau kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya roditumārabdhau |
S04n400:252: tatastau mātāpitarau kathayataḥ sma–jīvaṃstu putra tvamanuprāptaḥ |
S04n400:257: yathā śītalo vāto nāma putra āhlādakaraḥ |
S04n400:260: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin bālāhakaṃ tamaśvarājabhūtenāvalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tādṛśādahaṃ mṛtyubhayātparimokṣitaḥ |
S04n400:261: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin na śaknomyavalokiteśvarasya puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum |
